message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a unique product that holds immense value. While I can't disclose the specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me.  I'm confident it will be equally valuable, if not more so, to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a one-time offer, so consider it carefully.  Let me know your decision.
